*	All sessions will be streamed live via [Zoom](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/p/zoom-meetings-guide) or [Google Meet](https://support.google.com/meet/?hl=en#topic=7306097). The dial-in link to the streams can be found in the program via [conftool](https://www.conftool.pro/cen2023/sessions.php). If a password is required it will also be stated in the program.
*	Virtual participants can ask questions via the chat or Q&A functionality of Zoom or Google Meet. Please make sure that your microphone is muted.
*	Only keynote sessions will be recorded and made available after the conference.
